import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Respond to approval request"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/workflow/approval/response"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Submits an approval decision (approve or reject) for a ticket that is awaiting workflow approval. This endpoint is used by designated approvers to advance tickets through approval gates in multi-stage workflows, such as budget approvals or change management processes.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with approval status filter to find tickets awaiting your approval and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. The authenticated user must be a designated approver for the ticket's current workflow step.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find pending approvals: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with approval filter → extract `TicketId`
2. Review ticket: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) and [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/approvals](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-approvals) for context
3. Submit decision: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/workflow/approval/response](/docs/api/tickets/process-ticket-approval) with approve/reject decision
4. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/status](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-status) to confirm workflow advanced

**Request Body**: Provide `IsApproved` (boolean) and optional `Comments` explaining the decision.

**Note**: Rejection may return the ticket to the requester or previous step depending on workflow configuration.

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/approvals](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-approvals) – View approval history and status
- [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/status](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-status) – View current workflow status

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for submitting an approval decision on a workflow step.","properties":{"TicketId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the ticket being approved. Should match the ticketId path parameter.","example":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"}},"WorkflowStepId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier of the workflow step being approved or denied. Obtain from [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/status](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket-status) and read `AwaitingApprovalWorkflowStepId`.","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"getTicketStatus","endpoint":"GET /api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/status","responseField":"Item.AwaitingApprovalWorkflowStepId"},"example":"953d07c9-554f-ec11-9820-0003ffe402cf"},"Action":{"type":"string","enum":["Approve","Deny"],"description":"The approval decision. Use `Approve` to advance the ticket or `Deny` to reject the approval request."},"Comments":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Optional comments explaining the approval or denial decision. May be displayed to the ticket requestor depending on IsCommentPublic setting."},"IsCommentPublic":{"type":"boolean","description":"When true, the comments are visible to the ticket requestor. When false, comments are only visible to agents and approvers.","default":false}},"required":["TicketId","WorkflowStepId","Action"],"example":{"TicketId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","WorkflowStepId":"953d07c9-554f-ec11-9820-0003ffe402cf","Action":"Approve","Comments":"Request approved - all requirements met.","IsCommentPublic":true},"title":"TicketApprovalRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
